name: Fast and Sideways (Open-Sourced)
description:
Game is a submission for Trijam #48 (3 hour game jam hosted by Rocknight Studios). Theme is "Faster... FASTER... F-A-S-T-E-R"so first idea was cars and drifting.

For this game was used modified tiles from: https://opengameart.org/content/race-track-tiles
Car sprite: https://opengameart.org/content/cars-2

Source - https://github.com/nezvers/Godot_jam_games_3.1
Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb4-Y0E6mmwjtawcitIAzKQ
Twitter - https://twitter.com/NeZversStudio
